abstract: Editorial scores seven-year jail sentence imposed on former Ukrainian Prime Min Yulia Tymoshenko; holds that decision reeks of Soviet-style political revenge and reminds Ukrainian Pres Viktor Yanukovich that election victory gave him the right to run the country, not to jail those who oppose him.
snippet: The jail sentence imposed on Yulia Tymoshenko, the former prime minister of Ukraine, reeks of Soviet-style political revenge.
lead_paragraph: The jail sentence imposed on Yulia Tymoshenko, the former prime minister of Ukraine, reeks of Soviet-style political revenge.
